name: sfchronicle
text:
Washington's NFL team is officially changing its name. 

See, it wasn't that hard, writes @annkillion. Even when forced by interests of greed rather than righteousness, change can be made. https://t.co/WCJhvH5u9t

text: The need for COVID-19 drugs will not evaporate once vaccines are available. https://t.co/bo6luTrKB4

text: With statues of controversial historical figures coming down in S.F., @TonyBravoSF has ideas for how to replace them ‚Äî and honor local pop culture and people of color: https://t.co/xML0UT7s5Y

name: sfchronicle
text: Sierra County DA charges 40-year-old wanted felon with murdering Danville doctor over the Fourth of July weekend while the father was off-roading with his teenage son. Among the 9 charges: murder, attempted murder and burglarizing gold mine. via @MGafni: https://t.co/Q8K24KEbqP https://t.co/ooLWVOfxP0

name: sfchronicle
text: What if you took two blocks of office towers in the Financial District, closed off traffic between them and turned the street into a park?  Introducing the micro-hood: https://t.co/iMgW4ZRXcQ

name: sfchronicle
text: Companies are already mulling how to incorporate social distancing and new cleanliness protocols into their offices. But architects Elizabeth Ranieri and Byron Kuth are thinking bigger by exploring the idea of micro-hoods: https://t.co/yQiDPZOI6f

name: sfchronicle
text: Grant Imahara, an electrical engineer and former ‚ÄúMythbusters‚Äù host, dies at 49, media reports say. https://t.co/HM7jk6aIN0

name: sfchronicle
text: Orange County's Board of Education reportedly votes 4-1 on Monday night to allow schools to reopen next month for in-person instruction without requiring masks or social distancing. Individual schools in the county, however, are not bound to the decision. https://t.co/7cvltBJNb7

name: sfchronicle
text: More on the death of Grant Imahara: https://t.co/1bT8dmzi8q https://t.co/s9hzmXR1j9

name: sfchronicle
text:
Shahid Buttar, the democratic socialist challenging Nancy Pelosi, is trying to convince her to debate him. It‚Äôs an uphill battle. Pelosi hasn‚Äôt debated an opponent in 33 years.

name: sfchronicle
text: Will your Bay Area school be online, in-person or both? Here's a glance at some districts' plans for the fall. https://t.co/xQkb14j4Nb https://t.co/wa06ESrjsy

name: sfchronicle
text: Parents and teachers are anxious and upset about the way plans for reopening schools in the fall are still up in the air. @jilltucker talks about the latest in an unstable situation. Listen to our Fifth & Mission podcast: https://t.co/6cPP0qqHjp

name: sfchronicle
text: Politicians and public health leaders have committed to equitably sharing any vaccine that works, but an initiative to make that happen may allow rich countries to build their stockpiles and leave fewer doses for the poor, the Associated Press reports.  https://t.co/M2zMOyFrss https://t.co/61dyFcnn2X

name: sfchronicle
text: A new White House-backed ad campaign aims to encourage people who are unemployed or unhappy in their jobs or careers to go out and ‚Äúfind something new.‚Äù  https://t.co/E796GDAuYP https://t.co/HD5hK94s73
